title: A new Schiff base 2-benzoylpyridine-based copper complex on boehmite nanoparticles as a recoverable nanocatalyst for the homoselective synthesis of 5-substituted tetrazoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16269-16277
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03139C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Elham Mohseni, Arash Ghorbani-Choghamarani, Bahman Tahmasbi, Masoomeh Norouzi
In this research, the surface of boehmite NPs were modified and functionalized by 2-benzoylpyridine toward the immobilization of copper ions as a practical catalyst in the synthesis of tetrazoles.
